sentences.english: Used to weight the flax fiber or flax caudex sample.
sentences.chinese: 用於定量稱重亞麻的纖維或麻莖試樣。

sentences.english: It has the function of weigh-in-motion (WIM) and Automatic Vehicle Classification (AVC) systems.
sentences.chinese: 該系統可以同時實現車型分類和動態稱重。

sentences.english: Weighing mechanism shall be temperature compensating and shall have automatic dampener to reduce oscillations.
sentences.chinese: 稱重的機械裝置應有溫度修正和自動潤滑以減少震動。

sentences.english: The "YIDE" sensor is a well-known brand in sensor industry in China.
sentences.chinese: 同時我們承接國內外稱重傳感器的修理及諮詢業務。

sentences.english: However, after the milk was weighed, Wang was told it was worth only 4, 100 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在牛奶被稱重後，王被告知它只值4100元。

sentences.english: After treatment, the tumor weight was measured and tumor growth inhibitory rate was calculated.
sentences.chinese: 治療結束後斷頸處死裸鼠，剝瘤稱重，計算抑瘤率。

sentences.english: On day 28, the sarcoma tumors under the skin were recovered from the mice and weighed.
sentences.chinese: 在第28天時，皮下腫瘤從老鼠身上取出並且稱重。

sentences.english: He needed a  forklift truck to carry it to the official weighing.
sentences.chinese: 他需要用剷車把這顆南瓜載到官方稱重地點稱重。

sentences.english: He needed a  forklift truck to carry it to the official weighing.
sentences.chinese: 他需要用剷車把這顆南瓜載到官方稱重地點稱重。

sentences.english: Load cell installed in the outdoor rain to pay attention to radiation.
sentences.chinese: 安裝在室外的稱重傳感器要注意防雨防輻射。

sentences.english: Electronic crane scale is hanging the goods weighing the ideal measuring instruments.
sentences.chinese: 電子吊秤是懸掛貨物稱重理想的計量器具。

sentences.english: Determing control and weighting control in paint produce were introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要論述塗料生產中計量與稱重的控制方式和組成。

sentences.english: Collect the tumor, calculate the anti-tumor rate.
sentences.chinese: 取小鼠腫瘤稱重，計算抑瘤率。

sentences.english: A portable torsion balance is used for weighing.
sentences.chinese: 用一臺輕便的彈簧秤稱重。

sentences.english: In this image, a feeder weighs the cub during a physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 這幅圖中，飼養員在體檢過程中給幼崽稱重。

sentences.english: Weighting of radwaste machines is a necessary procedure.
sentences.chinese: 對運載着放射性廢料的卡車的稱重是個必要的過程。
